mapper.select: SELECT question_no questionNo, member_name memberName, question_title questionTitle, question_content questionContent, question_reputation reputation, question_createdate questionCreateDate, question_updatedate questionUpdateDate, question_ip questionIp, question_views questionViews FROM dev_question WHERE question_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY question_createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_question WHERE question_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT answer_no answerNo, question_no questionNo, member_name memberName, answer_content answerContent, answer_createdate answerCreateDate, answer_updatedate answerUpdateDate, answer_ip answerIp FROM dev_answer WHERE answer_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR member_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR answer_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY answer_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_answer WHERE answer_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR member_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR answer_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
